ygData.subject: Re: The Minions on the march
ygData.msgSnippet: Rockseeker slowly followed his sister, wondering at the same time when the drones would arrive. After all, he was no warrior and the surge - or was it Hydras?

Rockseeker slowly followed his sister, wondering at the same time 
when the drones would arrive. After all, he was no warrior and the 
surge - or was it Hydras? - had left him damaged.

Rockseeker: I will offer all the support I can. You are the 
conqueror, after all...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Lunekill : :
> 
> As Lunekill was about to take off, she recieves the telepathic 
message from Unicron.
> 
> Lunekill: Brother, I will set up a jamming field to block all 
transmissions. As we systematicaly destroy the factions on this 
planet, we search for the Matrix. I believe the Maximals would be the 
most likely to know of its whereabouts.
> 
> Lunekill changes to her orbiting station mode(OOC: Thing of a 
smaller scale version of Deep Space Nine), and then launches six 
probes into orbit, which set up the jamming field.
> 
> Lunekill then slowy moves towards the Maximal base.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Rockseeker: Ready when you are, I said. These two will have their 
> time when we get to them. Let's stick to our plan.
> 
> He transformed to meteor and was ready to go.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Lunekill : :
> > 
> > The powerful femmebot looks to her brother.
> > 
> > Lunekill: If you feel you are up to it now. Should we attack the 
> Maximals first, as we planned, or hunt down these two?
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Dreadplague transforms and soon, a large winged beast leaves the 
> > canopy of the trees. She flies out as fast as she can.
> > 
> > Rockseeker, on the other hand, is ready to go on.
> > 
> > Rockseeker: Let's resume, shall we, Sister?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > : : DeathStar/Lunekill : :
> > > 
> > > DeathStar transformes and heads out with Dreadplague. He sees 
the 
> > odd activity around Dread though.
> > > 
> > > "What the?" He thinks, but decides to worry about it later.
> > > 
> > > Lunekill smirks as the Tripreds  retreat.
> > > 
> > > Lunekill: That's quite alright worms, I'll kill you all later.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: This is for fans of Vampire:The Masquerade. Remember 
> > > Obtenebration?
> > > 
> > > BIC:
> > > 
> > > Unbeknownst even to her, Dreadplague had unconsciously 
developed 
> a 
> > > new power. As she heard Deathstar, she went out of hiding. The 
> very 
> > > shadows around her seemed to deepen and to move along with her. 
> She 
> > > was under the tree canopy, running for her life, while tendrils 
> of 
> > > pure darkness extended, ready to act if the necessity arose.
> > > 
> > > Dreadplague: Move Deathstar! We have to get going! Take off!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > : : Lunekill/DeathStar : :
> > > > 
> > > > Lunekill watched Dread go down, and the cloaking start.
> > > > 
> > > > Lunekill: What the?
> > > > 
> > > > Just then DeathStar finished collecting data.
> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar: Dread, are you ok? We can pull back!
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > The huge winged beast fell to the ground after being hit once 
> > again.
> > > > Dreadplague transformed in her cloaked robot mode and went 
> under 
> > > the 
> > > > cover of a low rocky formation, barely able to fit there.
> > > > 
> > > > Something was happening. She seemed to make the shadow move 
> > around 
> > > > her. What was going on?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > : : Lunekill : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Lunekill clenched her optics tight, hsaking her head. She 
> could 
> > > > feel the emotion penetrating her mental circuits. This one 
had 
> > > > telepathic abilities. With an effor, Lunekill locked out her 
> head 
> > > > from Dread and reconcentrated her fire.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Lunekill: Well that was interesting. Not many Cybertronians 
> > have 
> > > > that power...
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Dreadplague was hit bad, but she tried to soak as much as 
she 
> > > > could. 
> > > > > She had to give Deathstar the time to collect data. She had 
> to 
> > > > fight 
> > > > > back.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Focus as hard as she could, she sent total terror into 
> > Lunekill. 
> > > > She 
> > > > > was not sure the other was going to fall prey to it, but 
she 
> > had 
> > > to 
> > > > > try.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > : : Lunekill/DeathStar : :
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > DeathStar took a scanner from subspace and started to 
> collect 
> > > the 
> > > > > data on these minions.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Lunekill was quite annoyed by the shrieking sound and 
> > extended 
> > > > her 
> > > > > other arm. Now energy bolts were coming from both hands, 
> > shooting 
> > > > at 
> > > > > Dreadplague. Some of the shots missed, striking and 
> destroying 
> > a 
> > > > > mountain in the distance.(OOC: DBZ style)
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Dreaplague, hearing Deathstar's warning, transformed to 
her 
> > > Fell 
> > > > > > Beast mode and made her way over the shot. That was not 
> > > supposed 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > happen. They were not even in range to be discovered yet, 
> as 
> > > they 
> > > > > > were still in relative radar cover.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Dreadplague: Deathstar! Get the data! I'll distract them!
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > She tried to get Lunekill's attention by shrieking as 
> harshly 
> > > as 
> > > > > she 
> > > > > > could. 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Rockseeker, stayed behind. He was still worn out from the 
> > > surge, 
> > > > > but 
> > > > > > he observed.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > : : DeathStar/Lunekill : :
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > DeathStar is quite happy to learn that Dreadplague 
wishes 
> > to 
> > > > > become 
> > > > > > his student.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > DeathStar: It would be an honor...
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Then DeathStar comes into visual contact with the 
Minions.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > DeathStar: Well, Dread, there is the source of those 
> > signals. 
> > > > Do 
> > > > > > you want to observe them or introduce ourselves?
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Lunekill was about to fly off when she caught sight of 
> the 
> > > > > incoming 
> > > > > > Tripredacus.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Lunekill: Curiosity killed the Cybertronians.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Lunekill extends her arm, her long, claw like finger 
tips 
> > > > > glowing. 
> > > > > > She unleases several unknown energy blasts at Dreadplague 
> and 
> > > > > > DeathStar.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Lunekill: DIE YOU PATHETIC VERMON!!!!!!!!!!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > DeathStar sees the incoming shots.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > DeathStar: Dread, evasive!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > The star fighter barral rolls out of the way...
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > DeathStar: DeathStar, TRANSFORM!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Now in bot mode, DeathStar was ready to defend himself 
> but 
> > > > their 
> > > > > > orders were not to engage the enemy under any 
circumstances.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > > Rockseeker: Yes, Prime's heirs... Let's just hope no 
one 
> > > > figured 
> > > > > us 
> > > > > > > out and called for reinforcements yets. Ladies first.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > He indicated the south with his hand, ready to follow 
his 
> > > > sister 
> > > > > as 
> > > > > > > soon as she moved.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > : : Lunekill : :
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Lunekill: We start with the ones that would most 
likely 
> > > cause 
> > > > > > > master the most trouble. The Maximals!
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Rockseeker: According to my first pass over the 
planet, 
> > > there 
> > > > > are 
> > > > > > > > three major installations on this planet. The first 
two 
> > are 
> > > > on 
> > > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > same continent, but a third one is on the southern 
> > > continent. 
> > > > > > Where 
> > > > > > > > do we start, General?
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > > > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > > > > wrote:

> has 
> > > > been 
> > > > > > lost 
> > > > > > > > since the recent revolution on Cybertron.
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > She closes her optics, summoning her drones to 
Earth.
> > > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > >

dreaded 
> > > thing 
> > > > > had 
> > > > > > to 
> > > > > > > > be 
> > > > > > > > > found and destroyed!
> > > > > > > > >

your 
> > > summon 
> > > > > > your 
> > > > > > > > > drones?

> > > > a 
> > > > > > > threat

knew 
> > her 
> > > > > > brother 
> > > > > > > > > would be clear on what she was talking about.

> > > > > > > > > > >

We'll 
> > take 
> > > > > care 
> > > > > > of 
> > > > > > > > > them 
> > > > > > > > > > the same way we do all lower beings... total

> > > > > > > > > > >

> > least, 
> > > > she 
> > > > > > had 
> > > > > > > > > > helped

> > > > > him,

Energon 
> > > here 
> > > > is 
> > > > > > so 
> > > > > > > > > strong 
> > > > > > > > > > > that I lost all restraints. Master will like

> > > Now, 
> > > > > how 
> > > > > > > > > should

> > > > > > > > > > > rid ourselves of the ants?

> > > > > > > > > > >

> > > > rid 
> > > > > of 
> > > > > > > the

> > > > > > > > signal 
> > > > > > > > > is

> > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > barrier 
> > > > > > > > > > of
